enigma_edit.lua.data

Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object
    • enigma_edit.lua.data.Data
      • enigma_edit.lua.data.MM<Source>
        • enigma_edit.lua.data.Variable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assignable, Dereferencable, Typed

    public class Variable
extends MM<Source>
implements Assignable
    This is a representation of the value of an identifier. This class contains the locations of the last assignment to a variable and its resulting content each for both easy- and difficult-mode.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class enigma_edit.lua.data.MM

    • Constructor Detail

      • Variable

        public Variable(Source easy,
                Source difficult,
                CodeSnippet assign)
        Variable creation (with easy- and difficult-mode in one assignment). This occurs by using a call to the lua API function cond.
        Parameters:
        easy - Easy-mode value.
        difficult - Difficult-mode value.
        assign - Reference to the assignment code.

      • Variable

        public Variable(Source value,
                CodeSnippet assign,
                Mode mode)
        Normal variable creation.
        Parameters:
        value - Initial value.
        assign - Reference to the assignment code.
        mode - Mode, the variable is created in.
